 How to play
 Can you find all LEGO bricks? There are many LEGO bricks hidden in boxes, you can find them by clicking the box. If the box you clicked does not contains the LEGO brick, you will get the scan number which shows how many LEGO bricks are hidden in the same row and column, try to use fewer scan to find all LEGO bricks.

You may also modify the difficulty by change the number of boxes and number of LEGO bricks hidden in the options

Good luck and enjoy the game.
